Function for generating messy data

Source: R/messy_data.R
messy_data.Rd

Function for generating messy data

messy_data(n = 20)

Arguments

n

the number of cases to generate

Value

a data frame with "messy" data

Examples

messy_data(n = 5)
#>      'ID Date of Onset. DisCharge.. GENDER_  Épi.Case_définition messy/dates
#> 1 ltdvnv     2018-01-10  20/01/2018     MALE          Not.a.Case      female
#> 2 sfkczt     2018-01-11  21/01/2018     male            PROBABLE        <NA>
#> 3 fqewjn     2018-01-03  13/01/2018     Male           confirmed  2018-10-18
#> 4 qgbsqf     2018-01-10  20/01/2018   female           suspected  01-12-2001
#> 5 yffwze     2018-01-02  12/01/2018     male           confirmed  2018 10 19
#>        lat      lon
#> 1 15.09329 48.22227
#> 2 10.42140 47.03783
#> 3 13.75023 48.05203
#> 4 11.88616 48.90004
#> 5 13.60485 47.60510
messy_data()
#>       'ID Date of Onset. DisCharge.. GENDER_  Épi.Case_définition
